website_summaries.verdict: The affordable Urbanears Sumpan earbuds look fantastic but sound merely average.
pros: Eye-catching colors in a spare, striking design
Storage-friendly features keep cable loop wrapped and in place when not in use
cons: Audio can sound dull and muffled

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, so uncomfortable they hurt.
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound quality of Urban Ears, however, these are so uncomfortable. 2 stars for value for money as I wish I didn't spend so much on these. They actually hurt my ears so I cant wear them for very long at all, not even half an hour. Wish Urbanears would bring back the Bagis in ear headphones as they were so comfortable and the best. Do not recommend these unless you don't have weird earholes for them to fit in. Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Annoying ear pieces
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones, I listen to a lot of audiobooks and the sound quality is perfect. I like the way the jack can be used to keep the cable tidy. The biggest issue with these is the rubber part that goes into your ear twists round and often gets left behind in my ear when I take them out, I've have now lost one of these rubber bits and have given up with them altogether, they seem to work on with out them.
customer_reviews.author: Lottiesarahsmum

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones and the colour is so unusual and beautiful, they sound really good the only problem is the ear piece is a little uncomfortable but that may just be my ears as I find most in ear headphones don’t suit my ears apart from that they are headphones I would recommend if your after this style.
customer_reviews.author: rawr88

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very handy
customer_reviews.text: Nice little pair of earphones. I ll be honest, I love the look of these things, the sound is pretty good as well. being able to attach them around your neck is actually very handy. All in all, for the price, these are very good. I have them 3-4 months now and they hold up well, strong build.
customer_reviews.author: eric launay

customer_reviews.title: Volume button
customer_reviews.text: Does not have a volume button on the headphone, so you need to adjust it from the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dorcas V

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great - but you just won't end up using them
customer_reviews.text: As many have said before, these are very (very) odd shapes - and just fall out your ear; or, if you manage to get them to stay, your ear will ache as it reshapes. It's just not worth it for a pair of headphones that will almost immediately become your spare pair.
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones, but...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good. However I had to superglue the ear covers to the buds as they always kept coming off.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Recommend the in-ears instead
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay in the ear the way it is supposed to. Recommend the in-ears instead, they last long and fit in better
customer_reviews.author: summernigh

customer_reviews.title: Broken.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are good but they have broken and in 4 months! I haven't been able to find a way to contact the seller to ask for an exchange? I feel for the price, this is poor quality. The ear buds also fell off and were lost within a week of purchase. But I appreciate that was partly my own fault.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this earphones
customer_reviews.text: I love this earphones.Great colour and easy to carry. The only thing is the size is slightly bigger. Feel uncomfortable after worn a while.
customer_reviews.author: LiYu

customer_reviews.title: Best tangle free option out there!
customer_reviews.text: Best tangle free option out there! I have been using these for about a week already and the quality and build of these are so good. It also doesn't come out of your ears so easily even with a tug. The braided cables are also a very nice touch. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: NOPE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great buy but barely above average sound quality. great value!
customer_reviews.author: Huthoff

customer_reviews.title: Great fit/short life
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, sound and style but I’ve had 3 pairs and they break almost bang on 6 months every time
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It is broken within 5 months,one side does not have sound now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Painful and disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The sound is decent but they're so painful! Theyre not soft in ear but surprisingly firm and will hurt after about an hour of using them. Considering I bought them for an 8 hr flight it was a massive disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Lewin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty poor headphones from an otherwise decent company
customer_reviews.text: Pro: - Very comfortable Cons: - Can't use these in any kind of vaguely loud environment, as all external sound comes in. - Quality-wise, they are mediocre, as the rubber cover piece that fits into the ear keeps coming off the speakers, sometimes even just by removing them from your ears, with it remaining in your ear. - The mesh covering the speaker on one earbud has fallen out after about 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: RK

product_meta.title: Urbanears Sumpan Hooked Up Earbuds - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlackSumpan may be minimal in appearance, but this lightweight semi-earbud packs some big personality. Anything but boring, Sumpan boasts a colorful palette, a flexible on-the-go attitude, and unexpected features like a behind-theneck hook function, and easy to wash (and even replaceable) earbuds. Sumpan isn’t without the essentials either— like a 3.5 mm headphone jack, a built-in microphone and remote compatible with Android and Apple, and a tangle-free fabric cord to keep things neat and tidy.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Sumpan Earbuds
feature_bullets: Hook Construction - Connect around your neck when not using the Bagis
Microphone and Remote Compatible - Mic and remote compatible with most devices using the unprotected 3.55mm standard
CableLoop - Wrap up your cable and fasten it in place
Size Adjustable - Adjust the size with the enclosed sleeves
Tangle Resistant Fabric - 120cm/47" tangle resistant fabric and TPE cord with Kevlar inside
